nodes.text: House Knylenn, or the Knylenn family, was one of the ruling families of Kuat.

The Knylenns were primary rivals of the Kuat family and attempted to usurp their power by overturning the Inheritance Exemption. The confrontation came to a head when Khoss of Knylenn arranged his elder's death, keeping the man on a life-support system and ensuring his own rule. However, he was exposed by Kuat of Kuat and Kodir of Kuhlvult.
